  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MappingStrategy
    Defines what fields of classes annotated by SliceResource are mapped by Mapper
    SimpleEnum
    User: krzysztof.ryk@solsoft.pl Date: 4/23/15 2:00 PM
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Children
    Allows mapper to map all child resources of a parent resource into array, List, Set, SortedSet or Collection.
    Follow
    Allows mapper to map a resource by following a path stored under given jcr property.
    IgnoreProperty
    Indicates that a SliceResource's field should not be mapped by Mapper.
    ImagePath
    Indicates that a SliceResource's field represents an image resource.
    JcrProperty
    Indicates that a given field should be mapped from a resource/property stored under specified path.
    PostMapping
    Method annotated by PostMapping is triggered after resource mapping.
    PreMapping
    Method annotated by PostMapping is triggered before resource mapping.
    SliceReference
    Allows for injection of models from a different location (path) than a current processing path.
    SliceResource
    Objects marked with this annotation can be adapted from Resource.
    Unescaped
    By default each text property will have HTML entities escaped; this annotation indicates the escaping should not be done (e.g.
